Module Simulator
Package kin.sim.debug

Class SimDebugPainterOverlay3D

java.lang.Object
kin.sim.debug.SimDebugPainterOverlay3D
All Implemented Interfaces:
DebugPainterOverlay3D
public class SimDebugPainterOverlay3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements DebugPainterOverlay3D
An implementation of the DebugPainterOverlay3D that paints debug drawings on the simulator's ground map.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

    • drawArrow

      public void drawArrow​(double cmX1, double cmY1, double cmZ1, double cmX2, double cmY2, double cmZ2, double headLen, double headAng, int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
      Description copied from interface: DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Draw an arrow.
      Specified by:
      drawArrow in interface DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Parameters:
      cmX1 - line start position x in world coordinates
      cmY1 - line start position y in world coordinates
      cmZ1 - line start position z (height) in world coordinates
      cmX2 - line end position x in world coordinates
      cmY2 - line end position y in world coordinates
      cmZ2 - line end position z (height) in world coordinates
      headLen - length of arrow head
      headAng - opening angle of arrow head (in radians)
      red - color red value
      green - color green value
      blue - color blue value
      alpha - color alpha value

    • drawChar

      public void drawChar​(char c, double cmX, double cmY, double cmZ, double size, double[][] rot, int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
      Description copied from interface: DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Draw a letter with lines. Note that only some letter can be drawn.
      Specified by:
      drawChar in interface DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Parameters:
      c - letter
      cmX - line start position x in world coordinates
      cmY - line start position y in world coordinates
      cmZ - line start position z (height) in world coordinates
      size - letter size in cm
      rot - rotate the letter in 3D, if null-rotation, the letter is drawn in the x-y-plane
      red - color red value
      green - color green value
      blue - color blue value
      alpha - color alpha value

    • drawXYZAxis

      public void drawXYZAxis​(double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double rotXY, double size)
      Description copied from interface: DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Draw the three axes arrows and 'x', 'y', 'z'.
      Specified by:
      drawXYZAxis in interface DebugPainterOverlay3D
      Parameters:
      offsetX - world coordinates of 0-point x (in cm)
      offsetY - world coordinates of 0-point y (in cm)
      offsetZ - world coordinates of 0-point z (in cm)
      rotXY - rotation in the x-y-plane (radians, positive goes counter-clockwise); z axis always points to 'sky'
      size - size of an axis (in cm)

    • drawXYZAxis

      public void drawXYZAxis​(RotoTranslation rt, double size, int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)

      Parameters:
